price: Kandi uzagira inshuti magara Allah, Intumwa ye, ndetse n’abemeramana; mu by’ukuri, itsinda rya Allah ni ryo rizatsinda.
arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فَإِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waman yatawalla al-laha warasūlahu wa-alladhīna āmanū fa-inna ḥiz'ba al-lahi humu al-ghālibūna
